channel.title: [639] Se7enscape First Release!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i523.photobucket.com/albums/w359/prededor5/Se7en-scape1.png[/img]
Welcome, This is my first release to moparscape :)
features: shops in different location perfect combat dung- not started fishing-100% wc-100% firemaking-100% cooking-100% herblore- 75% farming- 75% summoning- 50% all other skills are 100% except agility
lots more
pics:
[IMG]http://i523.photobucket.com/albums/w359/prededor5/grave.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i523.photobucket.com/albums/w359/prededor5/fullscreen.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i523.photobucket.com/albums/w359/prededor5/shops-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i523.photobucket.com/albums/w359/prededor5/castlew.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i523.photobucket.com/albums/w359/prededor5/commands.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i523.photobucket.com/albums/w359/prededor5/gravewords.jpg[/img] the last pic shows NEx and grave writing
how to make your self admin
find loginResponse(Player player) in the ActionSender class Look for [code]if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("PLAYER_NAME")) { player.getDefinition().setRights(2); }[/code]
and change it to your username
if you get this error (when trying to "run"): [IMG]http://i523.photobucket.com/albums/w359/prededor5/error1.jpg[/img]
go to C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\client copy everything in that folder click the back button make a new folder and re-name it Server paste all the files from the client folder into the server folder then run.
credits: me: 35% dememnthium guys & marc bob for the rune mtp base: 55% people who inspired me and helped me: 10%
Source(mediafire kept getting stuck so uppit!): http://uppit.com/ruxsrw0ixlkv/s7_source.rar client: http://www.mediafire.com/?slfs0djjb1gbe51

item.title: [639] Se7enscape First Release!
item.dc:creator: @gaming_man13 gaming_man13
item.description:
@gaming_man13 wrote:

[quote=“iiTzSkillz, post:43, topic:430536”][quote author=TheProGuider link=topic=533217.msg3951905#msg3951905 date=1332362291]
How to edit player info? I see they’re in [size=10pt].bin[/size] format, but I really have no idea how to change them. At the moment, my account is a standard user, but I want to make it an Owner account!!

Thanks in advance,

~TheProGuider~
[/quote]

go into the server files then src\org\dementhium and find ActionSender.java, open it and search for ADMINS then replace the name with yours[/quote]

i have done that but im still not admin on the sever,

Read full topic

[quote=“pokemonn, post:38, topic:430536”][quote author=Skyru link=topic=533217.msg3926867#msg3926867 date=1330306043]
Alright, I have read through all the comments on this thread, and I have one thing to say… If you can’t program a ‘639’ don’t download it! Simple as that! Jesus!

On Topic - I don’t see anything ‘unique’ here, but I see alot of future potential. Nice release.
[/quote]

thanks and the base is dementhium[/quote]
Dementhium has like 20+ Dupes…
not starting about the bugs , so for the people new to 525+ DLing this, make sure you know what your doing.

Read full topic

item.title: [639] Se7enscape First Release!
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

go to C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\client copy everything in that folder click the back button make a new folder and re-name it Server paste all the files from the client folder into the server folder then run.

That’s just saying there isn’t a jvm.dll inside the server folder (if there is one) in your jdk folder
it is most likely inside your client folder if it isn’t inside the server folder

Read full topic

i do like this but there is a lot that needs done to it like all the home teleports need to be set like thay are set in rs and in the tz place you cant get to jad cuzz it will not let you go to the minigame and you cant get to tz with out useing the fairy rings there is a lot of places that need to be fixed on here and a lot of things like the ge for the bigest thing cuzz the command ge stuff sucks big balls it just dont work i downloaded it like 2 days ago and im still fixing a lot of stuff and on the crafting well you cant craft any thing and you cant enchant anything etheri like this but there is a lot that needs fixed on it it would of ben better to get the blank source and if ther is a blank source please pm me a link or post the link here

tyvm 1airwolf
